description:
This webinar is for Entrepreneurs who want to learn:

  • How to figure out what the next step is in leaving their day job to launch a business
  • How you can get clarity on the direction of your life.
  • How to turn people's questions, comments, frustrations, and feedback into solid income
  • How to determine whether a future product will produce the money you need and deserve
title: 7 Steps to Quitting Your Job And Launching Your Business
